mapper.insert:
insert all
into UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN(HEAD_ID, USER_CNT, PLAN_DATE, PLAN_STATUS, ACTIVITY_STAGE,PLAN_DATE_WID) values (#{item.headId}, #{item.userCnt}, #{item.planDate}, #{item.planStatus}, #{item.stage}, #{item.planDateWid})
select 1 from dual
mapper.select: select ACTIVITY_NAME, UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.ACTIVITY_STAGE, USER_CNT,PLAN_DATE_WID,PLAN_STATUS from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN left join UO_OP_ACTIVITY_HEADER on UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.HEAD_ID = UO_OP_ACTIVITY_HEADER.HEAD_ID where UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN.HEAD_ID = #{headId} order by PLAN_DATE asc
select PLAN_STATUS from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN where head_id = #{headId} and PLAN_DATE_WID = #{planDateWid}
mapper.update: update UO_OP_ACTIVITY_PLAN set PLAN_STATUS = #{status} where head_id = #{headId} and PLAN_DATE_WID = #{planDateWid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uo_op_push_list_large( PUSH_CONTENT, PUSH_PERIOD, PUSH_STATUS, SOURCE_CODE, SOURCE_ID, USER_PHONE, IS_PUSH, PUSH_SCHEDULING_DATE, PUSH_ID ) SELECT T.SMS_CONTENT, T.ORDER_PERIOD, 'P', 'ACTIVITY', T.ACTIVITY_DETAIL_ID, T.USER_PHONE, '0', T.PLAN_DT, SEQ_UO_OP_PUSH_LIST_LARGE.NEXTVAL FROM UO_OP_ACTIVITY_DETAIL T where head_id = #{headId} and plan_dt = #{planDateWid}
mapper.update: update uo_op_push_list_large c set c.push_status='F',c.IS_PUSH='1' where c.source_code='ACTIVITY' and exists ( select t1.activity_detail_id from uo_op_activity_detail t1 where t1.activity_detail_id=c.source_id )
